summary: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.
cast: Jennifer Jason Leigh|Jude Law|Ian Holm|Willem Dafoe|Don McKellar|Callum Keith Rennie|Christopher Eccleston|Sarah Polley|Robert A. Silverman|Oscar Hsu|Kris Lemche|Vik Sahay|Kirsten Johnson|James Kirchner|Balázs Koós|Stephanie Belding|Gerry Quigley
title: eXistenZ
